column5: OFSC snowmobile trail permits on sale now. $180.00 if bought before Nov 1 and then they go up substantially.  Only available on line and I am not responsible for any wrong information in this post, check it out yourselves.  Personally...I can't wait for the trails to open
OFSC trails around here are terrible compared to the trails across the border in QC...which are absolutely amazing, but even pricier than Ontario

We in bro-hio are not so lucky (at least here in the canton area) to have dedicated snow mobile trails. But did I read prior posts correctly, you have to pay $180 for permit to ride them?!?! Nah....... No thanks! My wife and kids have walked them and they are very nice but $180 nice? Man I dont know.
Well, I ride in Ontario and Michigan...Mi permit is $45.00  Ont is $240 after Dec 1...still worth it  My sled gets 4,000 km a year

3:30 PM, there's snow on my deck here on the shore of Erie. It's not melting fast enough, why, oh why. It's not the shovel kind but it is frozen water regardless. 75F last Saturday, shorts and T shirts.  This isn't funny.
Yikes! I guess I better start my snowblower search now as I've heard this winter is going to be similar to last...
No snow here on LSC today but its still shirts weather. It was a tad bit windy
Let it snow let it snow. Easy for tracking. Not just for the deer,but to find my way back to where I started.LOL
where's my air miles statement
where's my air miles statement  The one that says,one way to Simcoe ice grounds ?
The one that says,one way to Simcoe ice grounds ? yeah, right....... not how about.....
Wow!  That's a beauty!
Spincast, what caught whom?  Looks like you're in Cabo maybe? Beauty of a fish there. Congrats. Now that will be enough rubbing it in sir, enough already.
unfortunately. that's not me (its an ad for an Antigua charter)- but, as I said, where is that air miles statement, I gotta destination in mind. Anyone know what a house costs in Antigua?
I think they are calling for a low of 33 degrees here tonight in tropical Medina. It was mostly a dreary day here, wet, windy, cold.
Lousy day here too in Ontario windy, windy windy
Frost on the roof this morning.
I saw some slushy lookin precipitation yesterday while winterizing my big boat, but it is october so let it snow baby!!!
Keep it down there JD lol.,woke up this morning to 3c.Little cool I'd say !!No frost where I am though yet this year.
I'm just a bit S.E. of tropical medina and I had ice pellets on the windshield yesterday ........  BOOOOOOO HISSSSSSSS GO BROWNS!!!
Ooof!
I'm just a bit S.E. of tropical medina and I had ice pellets on the windshield yesterday ........  BOOOOOOO HISSSSSSSS GO BROWNS!!! LOL they did go, to Baltimore.
BAHAHAHAHA YUP THEY DID!
My Bills squeaked one into the win column. That defence looks for real, gave up only 7 to a good offence And Kyle Orton? I thought he was doing TV.
"Squeaked" is great way to describe what the Browns did yesterday. Won by 1 point.......... A win is a win eh?
I wonder what the Lions kicker feels like today, lol.  I'll be surprised if he dresses again for Detroit.
He packed up his locker after the game never to return again.
I wonder what the Lions kicker feels like today, lol.  I'll be surprised if he dresses again for Detroit. They have cut him.
Not sure if I've ever seen a kicker miss 3 times in one game. Wow!
